Spy Streak:

     He zooms down after the pod, barely able keep up.
Nobody should be able to tell he is there, on radar or
any scanners he appears as a bird.
     He lands and transforms waiting for the new bot
to awaken.

(I have to get some sleep now, so please let me have
some say to the new bot before he goes off to another faction)
